markdownRemark.html: This golf course is situated only a few minutes from the famous Puerto Banús. The exclusive Country Club offers a high level of security and privacy, and numerous private facilities to their members and their guests. This 18-hole private golf course, probably one of the best in Spain, blends into its surroundings and has spectacular views of Gibraltar and the North African coast. It is surrounded by exuberant vegetation, thanks to the abundance of water supplied by natural lakes and springs, which makes for an ejoyable and varied round of golf.

frontmatter.title: Club de Golf La Zagaleta
